title: Children of the Holocaust
description: Children of the Holocaust is a blend of memoir, reportage and oral history that examines the inter-generational transmission of trauma. Originally published in 1979, and translated into many languages, the book has become a classic. This Kindle edition includes a new preface and an updated bibliography.Chosen as one of the New York Times Best Books of the Year, reviewers called Children of the Holocaust “a passionate, brilliantly illuminating work” and “an enormous achievement.”The sequel to Children of the Holocaust, a family and social history of Central European Jews titled Where She Came From is also available from amazon.com
author: Helen Epstein
